about_the_game:
This demo version is also for test play purposes, so basically all functions are available. (There are restrictions on the CPU and theme you can choose, the number of custom themes you can add, and the number of custom CPUs you can add.)

The demo version can be played online against other demo players.

If you find any bugs in the demo version, please report them on the message board on the REVERSI xVSx store page. We will fix bugs in the demo version as soon as they occur, just like in the release version.

We're not sure if we'll add anything to the demo version, but if there are any features you'd like to see included in the retail version or changes to the UI you'd like to see, please let us know on the message board.

Original stones, boards, backgrounds, BGM, and CPUs created for loading into the trial version can also be used in the release version.

You may freely post gameplay videos of this game and its demo version, whether you are an individual or a corporation, whether it is free or paid. No permission is required (even if you do, we probably won't be able to reply). We will not contact you after the fact about such actions or charge you a fee (however, please refrain from using it in a way that goes against public order and morals).

name: REVERSI xVSx Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built In
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: REVERSI xVSx is a party game where 1 to 10 people can play Reversi using self-made stone, board, terrain, and BGM. Up to 5 vs 5 battles can be played against the CPU or online. You can also compete against a self-made CPU using your own videos and thinking routines.
